Name: Name Unknown
Description: TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2011)

Name: Matilde (Josimar)
Description:
The victim was around 25 years old. The body was found on the morning of 2 June on a piece of wasteland.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; La Tarde, online portal, 2.6.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was around 30 years old and, according to witnesses, was shot by the driver of a black Ford Lobo, who after committing the killing fled the scene.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Mileno, online portal, 3.6.2011

Name: Karlota Gómez Peña
Description:
Karlota was killed on calle Condado in what seems to have been a targeted execution.

Before she was killed, two people in an old car approached several trans women to enquire whether they had seen Karlota. One of the trans women reported that one of the individuals showed a firearm to the ones they asked. Nobody informed the police.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; El Nuevo Dia, online portal, 6.6..2011

https://www.primerahora.com/noticias/policia-tribunales/nota/denunciaquemuertederamonmonchosalgadopudohabersidoporcrimendeodio-513384/

Name: Mailda dos Santos (Maria do Bairro)
Description:
Mailda's body was found by a student who called the police. The circumstances of the murder are reported to have been similar to the murder of Alicinha, which occurred on 28 May 2011 in the same area of Cuiaba.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Gay 1 online portal, 9.6.11, 14.6.2011.

Name: Carla (Juan Carlos) Tovar Cardenas
Description:
Carla's body was found around a week after she disappeared. Her body showed marks of multiple stabs and severe beatings. Three adolescents of 14 and 16 years of age were arrested and faced charges.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; El Occidental, online portal, 12.6.2011

Name: (Nathan Eugene Davis)
Description:
The victim was shot in the head near an apartment block where the victim was reported to have worked as a sex worker.

Her body was found near an apartment complex dumpster. The police released a sketch of the alleged perpetrator, who is assumed to be a man in his late 20s to early 30s.

tdor.info identifies the victim as "Miss Nate Nate (or Née) Eugene Davis".

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Houston Press, blog, 13.6.2011, 14,6.2011; Click 2 Houston, online portal, 13.6.2011

Name: Kenia (Lineker) Silva Nascimento
Location: Av. Deodoro da Fonseca, Natal, RN
Description:
The killing happened at around 8.30 pm. The victim was on the intersection of Avenida Deodoro da Fonseca and General Osorio in Natal as a car approached and one of three persons fired shots at the victim, who died on the location. One of the lines the police are investigating is homophobia.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Tribuna do Norte, online journal, 21.6.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The police suspect that the perpetrators took the victim to the location of the killling, and when the victim resisted hit the victim to death with stones.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Noticia Al Dia, online portal, 19.6.2011

Name: Casandra (Marco Fidel Luján) Hernández
Description:
According to one hypothesis, Casandra was killed because she had witnessed another homicide
